title: Was Bullying Victim Keaton Jones Beaten and Robbed of GoFundMe Money?
subtitle: Fake news sites took advantage of a controversy about a bullied middle schooler whose mother posted photographs of the Confederate flag to her Facebook page.
author: Kim LaCapria
vclaim: Keaton Jones, known for a viral video about bullying, was beaten and robbed of luxury items purchased with money raised via GoFundMe.
